matrix-pill-choice.title: This is your last chance, {name}.
matrix-pill-choice.dialogue: After this, there is no going back. You take the blue pill - the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill - you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes.
matrix-pill-choice.summary: Morpheus presents the iconic red vs blue pill decision.

matrix-pill-choice.title: A Witcher's Choice
matrix-pill-choice.dialogue: Will you accept the contract that ties you to destiny, or walk away to follow your own path?
matrix-pill-choice.summary: Geralt must decide whether to follow destiny.

dialogue.text: You’ve felt it your whole life...
Not everyone is ready to hear what you already know.
